00020 
00035 #define _MASTER(dev)    ((MINOR(dev)            == 0xc0)
00036 #define _SPECIAL(dev)   ((MINOR(dev)&0xe0)      == 0xc0)
00037 #define _CHANNEL(dev)   ((MINOR(dev)&0x80)      == 0x00)
00038 #define _FILE(dev)      ((MINOR(dev)&0xf0)      == 0x80)
00039 #define _RSH(dev) \
00040         (MINOR(dev)==227 || MINOR(dev)==228 || \
00041         MINOR(dev)==229 || MINOR(dev)==237)
00042 
00043 /*
00044  * IF _CHANNEL, minor devices code for channel
00045  *
00046  * normal channel device returns data as a column for the channel
00047  * space for 0..63 channels
00048  */
00049 
00050 #define IS_CHANNEL_DEV(dev)    _CHANNEL(dev)
00051  
00052 #define CHANNEL(dev)    (_CHANNEL(dev)? (MINOR(dev)&0x7f): -1)
00053 
00054 /*
00055  * IF SPECIAL, minor devices code for mastership, ROM or SPECIAL2
00056  */
00057 
00058 #define IS_MASTER(dev)      (_MASTER(dev))
00059 
00060 #define SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)  (_SPECIAL(dev)? MINOR(dev)&0x1f: 0 )
00061 
00062 #define IS_FILE(dev)    (_FILE(dev))
00063 #define IS_RSH(dev)     (_RSH(dev))
00064 
00065 #define IS_ROM(dev)     (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==0)
00066 #define ROWDEV(dev)     (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==0x1f)
00067 #define DEVRAW(dev)     (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==1)
00068 #define DEVDMABUF(dev)  (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==2)
00069 #define BIGDUMPDEV(dev) (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==3)
00070 #define AOIDEV(dev)     (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==4)
00071 #define AOFDEV(dev)     (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==5)
00072 #define DOIDEV(dev)     (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==6)
00073 #define DOFDEV(dev)     (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==7)
00074 
00075 #define AOFRDEV(dev)    (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==8)
00076 #define DOFRDEV(dev)    (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==9)
00077 #define STATDEV(dev)    (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==10)
00078 
00079 
00080 #define TESTDEV(dev)    (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==15)
00081 #define TFTPDEV(dev)    (_SPECIAL(dev) && (SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)&0x10))
00082 
00083 #define HAS_SLAVE( n )  ((SLAVES(dev)&(1<<(n-1)) != 0)
